ARABIC: يَٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعْبُدِ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنَ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحْمَٰنِ عَصِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Father, do not worship Shaytan. Shaytan was disobedient to the All-Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Why do you worship Satan, O father? Verily Satan was disobedient to Ar-Rahman.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Father, do not serve Satan, for Satan has indeed been a persistent rebel against the Most Compassionate Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Father, do not worship satan; he has disobeyed the Beneficent God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “O my father, do not be a bondman of the devil; indeed the devil is disobedient towards the Most Gracious.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O my father! Worship not Shaytan. Verily, Shaytan has been a rebel against the Most Gracious."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O my father! serve not the Shaitan, surely the Shaitan is disobedient to the Beneficent Allah:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Father, serve not Satan; surely Satan is a rebel against the All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O my father! Serve not the devil. Lo! the devil is a rebel unto the Beneficent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Father! Do not worship Satan -- for, truly, Satan is a rebel against the Most Gracious One!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O My father! worship not the satan; hath been Unto the Compassionate a rebel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Father! Do not worship Satan. Indeed Satan is disobedient to the All-beneficent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O my father! serve not Satan: for Satan is a rebel against (Allah) Most Gracious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O my father! Worship not Shaitan (Satan). Verily! Shaitan (Satan) has been a rebel against the Most Beneficent (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Father, do not worship satan; for satan has rebelled against the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O my father, do not worship the devil. The devil is disobedient to the Most Gracious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O my father, do not worship Satan. Indeed Satan has ever been, to the Most Merciful, disobedient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:44] O my father! Do not worship Satan, by obeying him through [your] worship of idols. Truly Satan is disobedient ([the intensive form‘asiyyan] means ‘one given to disobedience’) to the Compassionate One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 my father! Serve not the devil) do not obey the devil concerning the worship of idols. (Lo! the devil is a rebel unto the Beneficent) the devil is a disbeliever in Allah.
